objects.text:
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II sensor
• Fast autofocus with 77 selectable points
• Classic retro design with premium build

LIMITED TIME OFFER
DON'T MISS OUT!

product_details.name: FUJIFILM X-T10 Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled mirrorless camera design with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and shooting modes
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Real-time shooting preview with Film Simulation modes
• Multiple auto bracketing options for creative photography

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern layout designed to promote an electronic product prominently. The background uses a diagonal gradient split, combining deep navy blue (`#1a2639`) and nearly black (`#0d1321`), with abstract semi-transparent circles and horizontal orange elements for visual interest. A narrow orange vertical stripe on the far left provides contrast and emphasis.

The heading text layer (`heading`) introduces the product name using a futuristic sans-serif typeface in white. Below it, the tagline text layer (`tagline`) is highlighted in vibrant orange to draw attention to the product's key quality statement. A list of features is presented in a neat bullet point format using the `description` layer in white, maintaining high readability.

A decorative orange square (`decorative`) adds a modern ornamental accent above the description. The `subheading` layer, in uppercase white, emphasizes urgency, supported by a bold pricing text layer (`price`) in bright orange. The call-to-action rectangle (`cta_background`) and text (`cta`) further enforce immediacy with a strong orange-and-white combination.

The product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed to the right, partially overlapping between the gradient and the dark panel to maximize visibility and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy Blue: `#1a2639`
- Almost Black: `#0d1321`
- Bright Orange: `#f05d23`
- Pure White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a predominantly black matte finish, accented by hints of metallic silver and subtle detailing in white, red, orange, and yellow. The black body (#1A1A1A) offers a sleek, professional aesthetic, while the white branding and text (#FFFFFF) create striking contrast and legibility. The red (#E53935), orange (#F57C00), and yellow (#FFEB3B) accents on the dials and lens markings subtly highlight functionality without overwhelming the design. The glass lens features light green reflections (#A5D6A7), adding depth. A minimalistic color palette using black, white, and strong accent hues would enhance an advertisement banner, reinforcing the premium, high-tech appeal.
